GSD.description:
dm raid: fix address sanitizer warning in raid_resume

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 71f601c779b3cc1baf497796f5b922c3fe5d2a1e. For more details please see the references link.
